title: BBC Local Live: Coventry & Warwickshire on Friday 20 November 2015 - BBC News
summary: major investment set to create 1,000 jobs at coventry engineering firm .
coventry marks first transgender day of remembrance .
former sky blues player trafficked into uk .

documents.title: good evening
text: that 's it for live updates today .
we 'll be back from 08:00 on monday with the latest news , sport , travel and weather updates for coventry and warwickshire .
remember to wrap up warm this weekend - it 's certainly going to get chilly !

documents.title: weather : windy with gales
text: rain , sleet and snow spreading southwards overnight , turning windy with gales possible over higher ground .
a fine and sunny day tomorrow , but feeling cold .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: haskell back for wasps against toulon
text: england 's james haskell will start for wasps against rc toulon in rugby 's european champions cup at the ricoh arena on sunday .
sam jones returns to the bench , despite his performance against leinster last week .
the club 's italian prop lorenzo cittadini starts as a replacement , after his one-match suspension .

documents.title: coventry firefighters 'uncomfortable ' about questionnaire trial
text: firefighters in coventry have expressed concern about a pilot programme which means having to ask people about their jobs , drinking and mental health on home visits .
it 's part of a new `` safe and well '' questionnaire they 're being asked to fill in .
the fire brigades union says some firefighters are uncomfortable asking such personal questions .
but fire service area commander steve vincent says it 's information they already gather .

documents.title: housing boss jailed over fraud
text: a public housing boss who abused his position to steal £ 325,000 to buy a sandwich franchise in coventry has been jailed for three years .
lakhbir jaspal , deputy chief executive of accord group housing association , conned his employers with bogus invoices , said west midlands police .

detectives later discovered the money had been used to buy two subway franchises in coventry , with jaspal , who lived in a seven-bed home in gaydon , on his way to acquiring a third when his scheme was uncovered .
he admitted eight counts of fraud at birmingham crown court today and was handed concurrent jail sentences for his crimes .

documents.title: news : plans for a new £ 50m automotive site and firm fined over worker 's death
text: these are our latest headlining stories :
- automotive firm planning a £ 50m research and development site after chinese deal
- warwickshire firm fined over worker 's death
- footballer says he was trafficked to the uk for sex
author: Tom Cooke
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: boss defrauded charity to buy coventry sandwich shops
text: a top executive at a housing charity conned his employers of £ 325,000 to buy two sandwich bars in coventry , a court heard .

documents.title: football : two former sky blues players back for gillingham match
text: midfielder gael bigirimana and defender ben turner are both likey to feature for the sky blues against top-of-the-table gillingham at the ricoh arena on saturday .
both players have been brought in by tony mowbray on emergency loans until january .
coventry are second on the league one table , level on points with gillingham , but with a worse goal difference .
author: Geoff Foster
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire Sport

documents.title: weather : yellow warning for wind issued
text: a weather warning for wind has been issued by the met office across coventry and warwickshire .
it says a swathe of gale force winds , accompanied by rain and snow , will move across the area tonight starting at 17:00 .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: £ 30,000 reward offered to catch rail arson vandals who crippled line
text: a massive £ 30,000 reward is being offered for help to snare an arsonist who crippled the region 's rail network and caused widespread misery to west midlands passengers .
author: Birmingham Mail

documents.title: video : former sky blues player 'trafficked for sex '
text: former sky blues midfielder al bangura has been speaking about beingbrought to the uk when he was 14 and forced into male prostitution .
the 27-year-old was signed by tony mowbray in march this year and released from his contract in the summer .
he 's now working with the premier league to raise awareness of the issue .
author: Victoria Derbyshire

documents.title: travel : m40 congestion
text: slow traffic on the m40 before junction 3a for the m42 .
more details at bbc travel .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: warwickshire hospital first in world to recruit patient for major cancer trial
text: university hospitals coventry and warwickshire nhs trust has become the first healthcare organisation in the world to recruit a patient into a major new international cancer trial .
author: Rugby Advertiser

documents.title: coventry marks transgender day of remembrance
text: members of coventry pride and the lord may gathered at coventry council house to mark the city 's first ever transgender day of remembrance .
the transgender community is fairly big in coventry .
i think looking at the turnout today and how well pride went , shows how proud we are and how vibrant we can be .
author: Tom Grundy
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: weather : rain and snow moving in
text: lovely and bright at the minute , but rain and snow will push down from the north with strengthening northerly winds .
showers falling as rain , sleep and snow later with cold and windy frost and ice .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: latest : major coventry investment ; and footballer 'trafficked ' for sex
text: these are some of the main stories making the news this afternoon .
- coventry firm sign £ 300m investment chinese deal
- ex-sky blues player says he was trafficked in to the uk for sex
- warwickshire firm fined over worker 's death
author: Tom Cooke
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: jimmy hill : coventry city fc legend 's wife tells of his 'heartbreaking ' battle with alzheimer 's
text: bryony hill has told the telegraph howshe and jimmy coped with the 'devastating ' effects of the disease .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: new car site to create up to 1,000 jobs
text: martyn wheeler , managing director of cca said : `` the new research and development centre will allow us to produce vehicles from sketch all the way through to producing full body shells . ''
`` at the moment our main customers are bentley , jaguar land rover and aston martin , so we 'll be looking to support them , and also develop our customer base even further . ''
author: Tom Cooke
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: breakingcoventry firm set to create 1,000 new jobs
text: up to 1,000 new jobs could be created in coventry after a £ 300m investment deal between cad cam automotive and the chinese firm china red sun group .
the money will be invested over the next five years , starting with an initial £ 50m on a new vehicle research and development centre in the coventry area .
cca will promote development create up to 1,000 jobs , and look to develop the supplier base for additional support .
author: Tom Cooke
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: golf : nuneaton 's andy sullivan leads at halfway point in dubai
text: nuneaton 's andy sullivan shot a second round 66 to lead the season-ending european tour championship in dubai .
he 's the outright leader going in to the final two rounds , one shot ahead of emiliano grillo from argentina in second .
world number three rory mcilroy is in fourth .

documents.title: weather watchers : get involved
text: weather watchers have been sharing their photos of the blue skies around coventry and warwickshire this morning , including this one taken in warwick .
weather watchers is a brand new online weather club for people who want to help tell the uk 's weather story .
if you 'd like to join in and create your own weather reports you can sign up here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: scrap costly train park plan says nuneaton mp
text: train station car park plans should be scrapped in favour of allowing a £ 17m investment in nuneaton , creating a 100 new jobs , to go-ahead .
author: Nuneaton News

documents.title: hundreds on transplant list in the west midlands
text: more than 650 people are waiting for an organ transplant in the west midlands .
nhs blood and transplant figures show 257 of those people have been waiting longer than two years and 83 longer than five .
a campaign 's being launched today to highlight the true scale of the shortage of donors .
author: Joanne Malin
BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: bright future lies ahead for eliot under new boss
text: the woman who spearheaded nuneaton 's george eliot hospital through some of its most troubled times has been officially named as its new chief executive

documents.title: nuneaton schoolboy shot with with 'airgun '
text: a schoolboy 's been shot with what police say could have been an airgun in nuneaton .
police say a passenger produced what appeared to be an air weapon from a white car as it drove past the boy at 08:40 on thursday .
it 's being treated as an isolated incident .
author: Alec Blackman
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: kenilworth girl group reach final of singing contest
text: a kenilworth girl group have sung their way to the grand final of a national singing competition after progressing from an audition held at the national exhibition centre .
author: Kenilworth Weekly News

documents.title: world tour championship : sullivan starts second round well
text: andy sullivan fans have turned out to watch his second round of the european tour championship in dubai .
the nuneaton golfer is currently tied .
in second place .
he shared the overnight lead with ian poulter , martin kaymer from germany and australian marcus fraser .

documents.title: news : schoolboy shot with airgun and bridge opening delayed
text: these are some of our headling stories in the newsroom today :
- nuneaton schoolboy shot with air-gun outside school
- firefighters concerned about `` questionnaire '' trial
- andy sullivan tied second in dubai world tour championship
author: Moira Rawlings
BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: this week 's front page : police launch fox hunt investigation
text: a police investigation has been launched after video footage emerged which appears to show a fox being killed during a hunt near atherstone .
author: Atherstone & Coleshill Herald

documents.title: delay to repair work on historic bridge at water orton
text: people living in water orton , in north warwickshire , are being warned of a delay to repair work on a bridge that 's been closed since the middle of september .
the bridge on water orton lane has been closed since 28 september after a vehicle crashed into the bridge wall , causing part of it to fall into the river .
building restrictions , which are in place due to the age of the bridge , are being blamed for the delay .
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: school pupil shot with airgun near nuneaton school
text: the news understands that the student , who has not been identified , was hit by what is believed to be a bb gun near to chetwynd junior school .
author: Nuneaton News

documents.title: latest news : long marston housing application ; and delays to bridge repairs
text: these are some of the stories we 're looking at today :
- concern over housing application for long marston
- delay torepair work on historic bridge at water orton
- firefighters angry over `` questionnaire '' pilot
author: BBC Coventry & Warwickshire

documents.title: 108 drivers a day caught by traffic cameras in coventry - paying £ 3.75m in fines
text: coventry city council has raked in almost £ 3.75m in fines from drivers who strayed into bus lanes or parked illegally since 2012 .
author: Coventry Telegraph

documents.title: watch : latest weather for the west midlands
text: dry and bright at first before showers move in and it will feel a lot colder than of late .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: travel : winsford avenue closed in coventry
text: police are directing traffic on winsford avenue at the junction of the b4106 , allesley old road , after an accident 's closed the road in both directions .
more details on bbc travel .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning from coventry and warwickshire live
text: welcome to our live service for friday .
we 'll be bringing you the latest news , sport , travel and weather .
if you see something you think we should be covering , get in touch with the team by email or tweet us @ bbccovwarks .
author: Vanessa Pearce
BBC Local Live
